title: EXAMPLE: Special-Meeting Notices Are Key
summary: [EXAMPLE DATA] This month's newsletter covers critical updates for fire service administrators and commissioners. We examine recent OPMA cases that clarify requirements for special meeting notices, ensuring your agency maintains compliance with transparency laws.
compressed_content:
• [EXAMPLE] Recent OPMA cases provide important guidance on proper notice procedures for special meetings
• [EXAMPLE] New apprenticeship requirements affect how fire districts structure their public works contracts
• [EXAMPLE] Important considerations for managing leave bank deductions for FLSA-exempt employees
• [EXAMPLE] Recent developments in reverse discrimination law and their impact on fire service hiring
• [EXAMPLE] Additional regulatory changes affecting fire districts, including procurement rules
search_text: EXAMPLE OPMA special meetings notice procedures fire districts public works contracts apprenticeship requirements FLSA exempt employees leave bank deductions reverse discrimination hiring promotion practices procurement rules interlocal agreements transparency laws compliance fire service administrators commissioners
